## ConfigurableProductOptions interface

ConfigurableProductOptions defines configurable attributes for the specified product

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConfigurableProductOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribute\_code?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.attribute_code.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A string that identifies the attribute |
|  [attribute\_id\_v2?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.attribute_id_v2.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID assigned to the attribute |
|  [attribute\_id?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.attribute_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID assigned to the attribute |
|  [attribute\_uid](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.attribute_uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>Attribute</code> object |
|  [id?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The configurable option ID number assigned by the system |
|  [label?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.label.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A string that describes the configurable product option, which is displayed on the UI |
|  [position?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.position.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A number that indicates the order in which the attribute is displayed |
|  [product\_id?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.product_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> This is the same as a product's id field |
|  [uid](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>ConfigurableProductOptions</code> object |
|  [use\_default?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.use_default.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the option is the default |
|  [values?](./magento-api.configurableproductoptions.values.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[ConfigurableProductOptionsValues](./magento-api.configurableproductoptionsvalues.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array that defines the value\_index codes assigned to the configurable product |
